attributes.action: Provide universal free school meals to all children and young people.
attributes.additional_details: Childhood is a time of rapid growth and development, a healthy nutritious diet is essential. Children and young people should have universal access to at least one nutritious meal a day to aid their development and prevent illness.
attributes.background: We want the goverment to provide a hot and nutritious free school meal to every child and young person until they leave education.
